title: Best of The Program | Guests: Rep. Karen Whitsett & Harry Dent | 4/16/20
description:
Michigan state Rep. Karen Whitsett returns to the program with good news after speaking with President Trump about Detroit’s desperate need for aid. And she receives even more good news! Harry Dent, author of “Zero Hour,” joins to discuss why he predicted a 2020 depression last fall and what our economy could look like around the corner and in the next few years.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
